title: Meiteis abusing Indian Army
selftext:
The Indian Army arrested 10 armed Meiteis militants but the Meira Paibis (Meitei women) came out in the streets and blocked the roads. 

Local MLA and Minister came; negotiated with the Indian Army and was let go of the armed militants.
comments:
Source:

https://twitter.com/vijaita/status/1785272734815244604?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwgr%5Etweet

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=xthstxJhnvM

https://www.eastmojo.com/manipur/2024/04/30/manipur-meira-paibis-clash-with-indian-army-in-bishnupur/

Their arms and weapons were handed back to the armed militia. Meiteis called these armed militia as village volunteers. Likewise, Kukis called their armed militia as village volunteers. They are all mixed.
Kids shouting at guys with guns. LOL. I think the video demonstrates the Army's patience.
Imagine deploying army on your own citizens.
Behan ke lodon ko pta nahi hai army gand mae danda kaise ghusati hai
that tells more about army if they let the culprits let free.
Abey gaali toh dhang se bolna sikh lo madarchodo

And here is our friendly Kuki brothers. Pointing guns.

https://x.com/MalayaKhuman/status/1790782045913768284

These kids are just cussing, Kuki militants are point guns at the Indian Army/ paramilitary. And they retreated.

https://x.com/MalayaKhuman/status/1790782045913768284/mediaViewer?currentTweet=1790782045913768284&currentTweetUser=MalayaKhuman

Exactly!

Meitei brothers brought Light Machine Guns in front of the CMâ€™s bungalow and had a show down too.

No difference between Kukis and Meiteis.
